item.description:
FREE

Intro to Life Force Energy Course

6 PM Raw Organic Vegan Potluck

(bring dishes ready to serve with utensils and recipe - some have allergies)

Class registation and can pick up class materials at this time

Celebrate Randy Jacobs' Birthday too!!

7 PM  Hear what Life Force Graduates say
about the course & ask questions

Enjoy Healthful Snacks

  • Karen Woeller, LF graduate and polarity therapist, healed herself from Breast Cancer and loved the Life Force course so much, she wanted to share what she learned with others. After taking the course three times, she now teaches it in Northborough.
  • Dr. John Duffy,  LF graduate, learned to heal chronic ulcers and now passes on his knowledge to his patients.
  • Randy Jacobs, LF graduate and owner of Life Force Growers, distributor of wheatgrass and greens, says "Life Force Energy" teaches the powerful principles at work in life through which we discover that the body is self-healing and self-rejuvenating depending upon what you put into it.

Location is across from Harvey Industries where you can also park.  Handicapped access.

Bacon runs between Main St (Rte 20) between Joseph II restaurant and Gulf Station and goes to Lexington Street.
item.name: FREE Life Force Energy Potluck Intro Night
